name: BUDS OF CHRIST
briefDescription: Buds of Christ primarily works among orphans and vulnerable children in rural India. Our Mission is “to love, listen, learn and lead orphans and vulnerable children to live life positively and with dignity and be children of hope and courage to their peers and to their community”. We work in the areas of providing treatment education, health promotion among children living with HIV and AIDS and their caretakers. We are serving around 200 orphan children affected by HIV and AIDS in Namakkal and Salem districts in Tamilnadu. We work primarily in areas of HEALTH, EDUCATION, ADVOCACY and LEADERSHIP Development for orphan children affected by HIV and AIDS.
